timeline.bodyText: @co-jo can you please file an issue for Pravega Operator to remove usage of UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap for Pravega 0.9+
timeline.author: medvedevigorek

replies.bodyText:
@co-jo can you please file an issue for Pravega Operator to remove usage of UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap for Pravega 0.9+

Sure.
replies.author: co-jo

timeline.author: tkaitchuck

replies.bodyText: The Pravega Operator supplies certain default JVM options (+UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap), which are not recognized by later JVMs. Any kubernetes deployment wouldn't work until the Pravega Operator is adjusted accordingly.
replies.author: co-jo
